title: Verify UCIDownloader use update-type UCI scores file to update per-tenant UCI score.
custom_summary: Verify UCIDownloader use update-type UCI scores file to update per-tenant UCI score.
custom_steps: - Upload the update-type UCI score file to the GCS bucket.
custom_expected:
- UCIDownloader should identify the incorrect file format or structure.
- UCIDownloader should merge of the new data with the existing data in the destination and then saving the file at the destination.
- UCI score file should be processed: 1. unzipped, 2. validated, 3. merged with existing data
